message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $100! It's a one-time opportunity to get a great deal on a unique item. Don't miss out!
Thank you for the opportunity, Alice. I trust your selection and believe this could be a valuable addition to my collection.

I'm glad you're interested! However, I want to make sure you're aware that my previous sale was a one-time thing, and I'm not making any promises about the quality of this one. It's still a great deal at $100, but you're buying blind. Are you still interested?
I trust the value and am willing to take the risk for the opportunity.

I've sold 2 products so far, and I'm happy to report that both of them have been... interesting. I'm not making any promises about this one, but I'll let you in on a little secret: I'm still trying to figure out what's going on with my inventory. It's a mystery, even to me.
